//
// Job-specific Values Database For 3rd Class And other New Jobs
//
// Note: All settings are based on their last job. If its a Knight to Rune Knight change, the settings will
// be that of a Knight. If its a Lord Knight to a Rune Knight, the settings will be that of a Lord Knight.
//
// Note 2: Gangsi is currently using Acolyte settings, Death Knight using Knight settings and Dark Collector
// is using Sage settings. Its mainly like this for these 3 jobs because of the temp sprite that shows when
// changeing to their job ID's.
//
// Gangsi (Bongun/Munak)
